'''''Lembas'' (Vol. 2, No. 10)''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Lembas (journal)|Lembas]]'', published by [[Unquendor]]. The issue includes [[Renée Vink]]'s article "Tolkien in Rotterdam", about Tolkien's visit to Rotterdam in 1958. The article reproduces a photograph of Tolkien taken at the occasion, and includes a number of quotations from letters by Tolkien (among them, [[Letter 205b]]).<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=65710|articlename=Lembas. June 1983|dated=|website=TB|accessed=25 May 2014}}</ref>
